dooyit.ui

Class UISideMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UISideMenu

  • public class UISideMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    The UISideMenu class contains the methods to initialize the side menu and update its menu buttons.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize the UISideMenu class. It is used by the constructor.

      • initLogger

        private void initLogger()
        This method is used to initialize the logger. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initMenuButtons

        private void initMenuButtons()
        This method is used to initialize the main menu buttons. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initCategoryButtons

        private void initCategoryButtons()
        This method is used to initialize the category menu buttons. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initMenu

        private void initMenu()
        This method is used to initialize the menu view. It should only be called after all menu buttons and the category title have been initialized. This method is used by the initialize method.

      • initMenuPane

        private void initMenuPane()
        This method is used to initialize the scroll pane that will contain the menu view. It should only be called after the menu view has been initialized. It is used by the initialize method.

      • getMenuButton

                                                        java.lang.String userData,

        This method is used to create and return a menu button.
        Parameters:
        title - The name of the menu button.
        userData - The user data that is associated with the menu button.
        icon - The icon of the menu button.
        Returns:
        A menu button.
